scripts.dev: concurrently "cd dms-api && npm run start:dev" "cd dms-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd dms-api && npm run build && cd ../dms-frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd dms-api && npm run lint && cd ../dms-frontend && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd dms-api && npm test && cd ../dms-frontend && npm run test:unit
